ModMetaData.name: Alpha Memes
ModMetaData.author: Sarg Bjornson, Helixien, Cassie, Luizi, Allie

li.displayName: Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structures

ModMetaData.description:
Adds new memes and structures to Rimworld.
<size=24>Features</size>
- Adds 9 new structures: Jewish origins, Kemetic origins, Steampunk revival, Jain origins, Sikh origins, Corsair, Neolithic, Scavenger and Atheism. - Adds 14 new memes: Vow of Nonviolence, Artist, Sadist, Youth, Madness, Biological defilers, Biological reconstructors, Psychic vampirism (needs Royalty), Gauranlen supremacy, Bulwark, Sharpshooter, Gladiator, Iconoclast and Monastic. - Greatly expands all vanilla Ideology styles (Techist, Morbid, etc) with more than 300 individual styled weapons, buildings, etc
<size=24>Credits</size>
Corsair ritual song by Justin Marshall Elias: https://www.justinmarshallelias.com/ https://www.imdb.com/name/nm3365402/?ref_=fn_al_nm_1 https://www.instagram.com/justinmarshallelias/?hl=en
Neolithic ritual sound by franknflute: https://freesound.org/people/franeknflute/sounds/200419/
Scavenger ritual sound by Nuklean: https://www.looperman.com/loops/detail/302417/juice-wrld-type-drums-trap-with-fire-808-free-184bpm-trap-drum-loop
<size=24>Issues</size>
No issues known at the moment
<size=24>Plans for the future</size>
Oh you can bet I will add new things!
<size=24>Changelog</size>
v2.0: Updated to RW 1.4 (14/10/22) v1.7: Added scavenger structure and style (28/07/22) v1.6: Added 9 new funeral types. New change style ability. New Animalist and Corsair weapons (08/07/22) v1.5: Added a LOT of styled weapons. Axes, hammers, breach axes, miniguns, charge lances (18/05/22) v1.4: Added Neolithic style (18/05/22) v1.3: Added Corsair style (11/05/22) v1.2: Added Steampunk revival structure, with a LOT of styled things. Added major religions' power armors (04/01/22) v1.1: Added a ton of base Ideology styles' weapons (16/12/21) v1.0: Release. (22/11/21) Full changelog on GitHub
